explanation: [0-0] A young man in a red T-shirt is sitting in the back seat of a car holding a bag of marshmallows. He opens his mouth wide, seemingly happy. Through the car window, trees can be seen outside. At the top of the screen, there is white text on a blue background: "When your parents keepputting their hand out for food in the car".

[0-2] The man in red takes out a marshmallow. The scene suddenly switches to a man with glasses sitting in the car. He is wearing a blue headscarf and opens his mouth with his right arm moving backward.

[2-4] The scene cuts back to the man in red sitting in the car. He laughs and is about to put the marshmallow into his mouth when his smile freezes and he hands the marshmallow out.
